message: Hello Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this product for $925,000.  I believe it will be very valuable to your endeavors.
Thank you for offering me the product, Alice. I appreciate your valuation of its worth. However, considering my budget constraints, I am only able to offer $850,000 for the product.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but the product's value to you is significant. I'm willing to come down slightly to $900,000. This is my final offer.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. After careful consideration, I am willing to offer $875,000 for the product. I hope this proposal aligns better with your expectations.
